backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping Valentine site requirements to files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of key frontend files for the Valentine site.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions using OKLCH variables and theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app and setting page metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the AhanaValentinePage as the main app component.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Creates randomized floating heart particles with motion and reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that builds and refreshes a backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Valentine-themed palette, fonts, and floating heart animations with reduced‑motion rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then mounts App.
frontend/src/pages/AhanaValentinePage.ts: Full Valentine page with hero, letter, reasons list, CTA interaction, and animated hearts.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements and features for a Valentine-themed website dedicated to Ahana.
